snippet.title: Top 5 April Fools' Day Crafts
snippet.description: April Fools' Day is a great time to play fun pranks with -- and on -- your kids!

snippet.title: April Fool's Day
snippet.description: Of all days, today happens to be my birthday. I'm 31. I wish I could say this was an April Fool's joke, but it would be way too cruel. The best part about being an April Fool is that I've never been fooled. I've never f...

snippet.title: Top 10 Disney April Fools' Day Crafts & Recipes
snippet.description: Make your April Fools' Day extra 'Goofy' with these fun and silly Disney printables.

snippet.title: Disney April Fools' Trick Calendar
snippet.description: Looking to play a prank on someone? Slip 'em this calendar, and they'll be celebrating overflowing moons and Broccoli for Dessert Day before you know it!

snippet.title: Gus' April Fools' Mouse Hole
snippet.description: For a mouse like Gus, life in Lady Tremaine's chateau is filled with challenges -- like trying to outrun her sinister cat Lucifer. Inspired by that very scenario, here's an April Fools' illusion that portrays Gus peerin...

snippet.title: Under Covers Mickey Pillow
snippet.description: Looking for an idea that's guaranteed to catch your kids unaware on April Fools' Day? Consider an appearance from a very special houseguest. Just draw the covers up over this Mickey no-sew pillow to create the illusion ...

snippet.title: Disney April Fools' Mouse-taches
snippet.description: There's no better way to celebrate April Fools' Day than with a mouse-tache featuring your favorite Disney design. Choose your favorite character or color one yourself!
Try these April Fools' Day crafts and recipes inspired by your favorite Disney characters.
